name: Lift Aviation
about: LIFT Academy, owned by Republic Airways, is a U.S.-based commercial aviation pilot training school headquartered in Indianapolis. It provides state-of-the-art training using a curriculum that combines flight, flight simulator, online, and in-classroom instruction. Students train on advanced aircraft from Diamond Aircraft Industries and utilize Aviation Advanced Training Devices and immersive virtual reality technology. With locations in Indianapolis, Indiana; Columbus, Indiana; Galveston, Texas; and Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, LIFT offers a defined pathway to a career as a commercial pilot at Republic Airways, including partnerships with Purdue Global for college credits. LIFT ensures students learn the skills and culture necessary for a successful aviation career from day one. For more information, visit www.flywithlift.com. LIFT Academy is committed to training the next generation of commercial airline pilots.
